```{r, message = FALSE}

  install.packages("BiocManager")
}
if (! requireNamespace("GEOquery", quietly = TRUE)) {
  BiocManager::install("GEOquery")
}

  install.packages("readxl")
}
```

```{r, message = FALSE}
dataset_name <- "GSE186950"
GSE <- GEOquery::getGEOSuppFiles(dataset_name)
fnames = rownames(GSE)
table_norm <- read_excel(fnames[1])
table_raw <- read_excel(fnames[2])
```
